website_summaries.verdict: Sprinkle it on your carpet for an instant refresh.
pros: The citrusy powder has a plant-based formula that eliminates odors and gets out stains
Doesn't contain harsh ingredients like ammonia or bleach
cons: Container is small and scent is very mild

customer_reviews.title: This stuff absorbs dirt
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this stuff to make my house smell fresh. But I used it when it arrived today and when I vacuumed the carpet after letting it sit the carpet is Visibly lighter because of all the dirt it absorbed. I'm blown away seriously. I vacuum every day. Today was different because you could see all the gunk in the vacuum filter. So gross To think that I didn't realize how dirty it was despite my cleaning efforts yet I'm so happy that i found this bottle And can keep it this way from now on
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Nice change from supermarket carpet fresheners!!
customer_reviews.text: I am always in search of carpet fresheners because I have two dogs and four cats that pretty much have the run of the house and lay wherever they want. I decided to give this one a try. I really like it because it doesn't have a "fake" smell to it. And it really does eliminate the odors and leaves behind a natural fresh scent. I'm impressed and I will be buying more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Patti W.

customer_reviews.title: No Scent, Small Canister, Works
customer_reviews.text: I haven't tried other powder carpet cleaners so can't compare. It comes in a very small container and gets used quickly. Mine has no scent and looks like baby powder. It does seem to neutralize odor and stains if you follow the directions--you need to sprinkle it on areas you want to treat and let it sit for at least 30 minutes before vacuuming. It did a better job than spray cleaners (Resolve, Bissel) but you may want to try another product if you want fragrance.
customer_reviews.author: Min Pin MomTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Worked as stated
customer_reviews.text: The PL360 is a great product for those areas where your dog has had an accident. I've used this a couple of times and it has taken care of those unwanted odors. It does have a very light fragrance that I appreciate. I would give this 10 stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: VTCindi

customer_reviews.title: Good smell. Didn't realize it is not "Pet friendly"
customer_reviews.text: Good smell. Didn't realize it is not "Pet friendly". Pets need to be isolated from treatment.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Worked great on cat urine on wool
customer_reviews.text: I purchased on of those wool "cat pods" for my kittens, who then peed on top of it. Traditional pet urine cleaners can't be used on wool because the enzymes would eat the proteins in the wool. I used this instead. I blotted the urine, sprinkled this all over, and left for a while (a few days actually, out of laziness). Then I shook off the excess, put it in the washing machine on hand wash cold with Borax, and let air dry. No odor left at all after! I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: BEST carpet powder I've used and its all natural
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this carpet powder. I usually stay away from carpet powders because every one that I've tried always has a really strong chemical odor. This is the only product that I've found that has a really light, pleasant scent and does a great job of removing the odors. I'm always looking for natural cleaning products to use in my home because we have pets and this one definitely fits the bill! I'll be buying again for sure
customer_reviews.author: cfromtheblock

customer_reviews.title: Updated look but still good quality.
customer_reviews.text: It appears the company may have updated their labeling. I think I like the old one better but this one my kids like more. Product works, smells great, and is a great value for the amount of coverage provided. As a note: when my product got here have the seal under the cap was broken but it doesn't appear to be missing any product and I'm not putting it in my mouth so I'm not worried about it.
customer_reviews.author: c. TX_MO_DigitalHandyman

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: For me, it didn’t work. The odor is still there. In the guidelines it says leave it on for 25 mins or so. By looking at the reviews, a lot of people said give it another 5-10 minutes for a better result. I gave 35 minutes. Yet the odor stayed the same. Also, the odor isnt even really really bad. Its just bad, but did not go away from this product.
customer_reviews.author: Qasim

customer_reviews.title: Did Nothing
customer_reviews.text: Sorry but this did absolutely nothing for us. It came in a 2 pack. I used the first bottle and had zero result. Started with the second and nothing. I followed directions and then even let it sit longer. Still nada. The scent is really nice though. I was hopeful, but let down.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Odor be gone!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! We had a rug that we just could not get the smell out of. After many many products, this one finally did the trick. 2 months later the odor is still gone!
customer_reviews.author: Santiago Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Smells good
customer_reviews.text: I love this scent and it helps with dog odor in the vacuum and carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Reading is my ESCAPE from Reality!

customer_reviews.title: I'm impressed
customer_reviews.text: When I got this, first thing I did was hit some areas of the carpet that were smelling a little funky. (Four cats). I was impressed. A little scent at first then nothing. Vacuumed up and no smell. And my carpet feels softer. Win win
customer_reviews.author: jazzie

customer_reviews.title: I have bought this product three times
customer_reviews.text: It works very well at neutralizing stale, pet related, and teenage boy funk in carpets, futons, and dog beds. It smells very nice. I have bought a variety of carpet powders and have used plain baking soda and even very fine coffee grounds to absorb carpet odors but this works so much better. It is rather expensive, especially compared to the dollar store stuff but it just works better.
customer_reviews.author: Slam

customer_reviews.title: Worked great, nice scent.
customer_reviews.text: This worked great, has a nice fresh scent... Not overwhelming. Odor on the carpet was mild before using this, it hid the smell for about 2-3 days and then I had to apply it again. I did a light sprinkle over the entire room... Rubbed it in by walking on it (in shoes) and let it sit for about 45 minutes... Then vacuumed it. I would recommend it. I have tried carpet stuff like this from Glade and Arm & Hammer and those smells can be overpowering. This one was just right.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Great Odor Remover That Isn't Overpowering
customer_reviews.text: I really like this item. I noticed our dining room rug was picking up a dog odor because our two dogs tend to lay underneath the dining room table. I sprinkled this product and let it sit on the rug for a few minutes. I simply vaccuumed up the powder and it removed the dog odor. I really like the scent being that it is not too heavy and once you clean it up, it leaves virtually no scent, unlike those cheap chemical based carpet powders that smell really cheap and strong.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: quality and longtivity
customer_reviews.text: Tried this powder immediately very good, works well on my carpets and have a nice smell. Very happy with this product. Would purchase this item again.
customer_reviews.author: Elaina

customer_reviews.title: Didn't hate it, bust don't love it
customer_reviews.text: It smells ok, but I didn't feel like it did much to help my carpets smell fresh. It ran out pretty quickly too. It's just ok. I wouldn't purchase again though. Arm & hammer/glade carpet powders work and smell better in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Works great, small amount
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely effective for removing pet smells. It is easy to use it all quickly. I used it once a week on our bedroom area rug that is half under our bed and it lasted about 6 weeks. (So 6 uses from 2 bottles....) in reality using a box of baking soda is almost as effective and much less expensive. But the shaker and the fresh scent are nice and last longer.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Works better national brands and safe for your pets!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works great! I love the fact that it does the same job, if not better than the leading brands with harmful chemicals to your pets, while this one is completely pet safe. I will be using this again. I think the only downfall for this company will be that the product works too well, and I don't see me needing another bottle for a few months.
customer_reviews.author: R. A. BlackTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Allergic reaction. Not for us.
customer_reviews.text: Was hoping this would be what we’re looking for but, at least for us, my daughter and I had a quick allergic reaction to this product. Hopefully it will not affect you like it did us. But for us, I have to give it a Poor rating.
customer_reviews.author: T Moore

customer_reviews.title: WTF?
customer_reviews.text: So, how exactly do I know I got what I paid for when the product container doesn’t even have the proper labeling on it? I can’t even read the ingredients because there is literally nothing on this container but a barcode sticker. You expect me to use this without even knowing what ingredients are contained? I could be allergic to this but I’ll never know because I can’t read what this product’s made with.
customer_reviews.author: Allen J. Parker

customer_reviews.title: Works well. Minimal scent. Non Toxic
customer_reviews.text: Worked great to get the smell of a previous occupant from the carpet. First time I dusted the carpet with the power and let it soak for a few hours before vacuuming it. Did that again 2 weeks later and carpet has been odor free for a few months now.
customer_reviews.author: London Styles

customer_reviews.title: Not quite what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I swear it looked bigger in the picture, I mean I used half of it right out of the box so it wont last long at all...but I liked the smell well enough, just dissappointed in the size.
customer_reviews.author: Jonnlyz

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: My dog occasionally will have an accident in the middle of the night in our carpet. Even though I clean it, the smell lingers. This definitely neutralizes the smell. Will repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Just go to dollar general or any dollar store and get arm and hammer pet powder carpet cleaner. It's the same thing for ALOT less.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: It does the trick!
customer_reviews.text: I just bought a new home and the previous owner had 2 toy dogs so I felt like the carpet had a doggie smell. I used 2 bottles of this and it made a world of difference. It also helped with the damp smell for the carpeted basement steps.
customer_reviews.author: Valeria

customer_reviews.title: Love knowing that these are plant based!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 canisters a while back to replace the Arm&Hammer carpet deodorizer that I was using. I have lung issues and was getting concerned about all these chemical cleaning products in the home. I have been changing over to plant based cleaning products and so far, very happy with this neutralizing powder. The smell isn't overly strong and the powder seems to really absorb into the carpet well. I just wish the canisters were bigger as it goes fairly quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Noticed no difference
customer_reviews.text: I have tried using this for the entire bottle now throughout a 3-month span... my carpet looks/smells no different at all.
customer_reviews.author: it works

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I love the very light fragrance it has. I hate when I have products that mask the odors with perfume. This worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Ok product
customer_reviews.text: Created more or a mess than anything. May have deodorized a little?
customer_reviews.author: Ainara Echanove

customer_reviews.title: Smells nice -- didn't get ride of fowl urine smell
customer_reviews.text: Living in a new place were the previous owner's dog peed all over the carpet. Steam cleaned it, waited a week and threw this on to help. Smells nice but doesn't cover the odor at all. Don't expect miracles if it's an old 'accident'.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: It works to keep odor away
customer_reviews.text: I like this powder freshener...it does not fly all over the place when u sprinkle and I did not sneeze like so many of the brands that have artificial scents and toxins...it works as it should
customer_reviews.author: ALN

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: It does not have an extensive odor like other products.
customer_reviews.author: D_Correa

customer_reviews.title: Great carpet odor remover
customer_reviews.text: Worked great on our dog stank that was lingering on our carpet. Will be rebuying!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole M McClain

customer_reviews.title: not overpowering
customer_reviews.text: good product. bad shipping. The containers weren't taped or bagged and the powder was on everything else in the box. Otherwise, it seems to be working and the smell isn't fake and overpowering.
customer_reviews.author: KL

customer_reviews.title: Ineffective Product
customer_reviews.text: Our dog did a number on area rug. Reverse side was cleaned with enzyme cleaner and then dried. This powder, used on the pile, had little effect on the odor. It has little if any scent, which would be ok since some brands mask odor, but this product was a waste in my view and served no purpose.. One jar covers very little, by the way
customer_reviews.author: Faith 3591

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful scent
customer_reviews.text: It makes a room smell wonderful and I love that it's safe for my fur baby. It has two different size holes, one for a small area and one for a big area. Easy to open and use.
customer_reviews.author: Jojo

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Normally but strong scented ones and I hate them... glad I found this! Still has a bit of a scent but not overbearing or anything.. just smells.. clean?
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Good smell but it’s quite dusty almost...
customer_reviews.text: Lid design should be looked at- once I open the lid and dump the powder out on to the carpet, hard to shut the lid because powder particles all on the lid stopping it from shutting the lid.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Does the job with a light, pleasant scent!
customer_reviews.text: This powder is very light in fragrance and vacuums up easily!
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Not For Me
customer_reviews.text: This hardly has A scent at all and what it does have is not pleasant. It does not really lift orders. I used it one time and will never use it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great carpet powder for those with allergies
customer_reviews.text: I like this carpet powder because it has a nice scent and I'm not allergic to it. I've ordered it twice already.
customer_reviews.author: dizneygirlfriend

customer_reviews.title: got rid of pee smell
customer_reviews.text: overall neutralized smell of cat pee on carpet but not sure if it truly is non-toxic. the powder form was convenient to use but I ended up using almost 3/4 of it for one use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not do the job I wanted it to
customer_reviews.text: Smell is way too strong and smelled and baby powder. I bought this to illuminate pet dander and odor and it just made my house dusty looking from the white film left everywhere and smelled like a bad air freshener. It flew everywhere when I put it on the carpet, was not easily sucked up by the vacuum and covered the entire vaccum in white dust.
customer_reviews.author: Jayni

customer_reviews.title: Good for pet carpets
customer_reviews.text: Good scent, but I wish the scent would linger on the carpet. It does take out musty smell though
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing and works great!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best vacuum shampoos ever! Great for dogs and covering up their smell!
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte P

customer_reviews.title: Pet Lovers- You Need This!
customer_reviews.text: Things I love: Easy to vacuum up No headaches from use due to smell
customer_reviews.author: Q

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it!
customer_reviews.text: As an owner of three reptiles, two snakes, a cat, and rats, i have to rate this product a solid 5/5. I used this stuff and i cannot smell anything animal related at all!!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Robison

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Worked really good. Got rid of wet dog carpet smell within minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes the whole house smell great
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. Great smell. Perfect for use around stinky dog beds and cat box areas.
customer_reviews.author: lana owens

customer_reviews.title: smells good
customer_reviews.text: this has a fresh scent and gets the job done. great for carpeted stairs.
customer_reviews.author: Amar Bee

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Price point is really good and seems to do the job without a ton of dust flying in the air. No overwhelming smell that choked me either.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Tucker

customer_reviews.title: carpet deodorizer for pets
customer_reviews.text: Product works great for getting pet smells out of the carpet
customer_reviews.author: Anthony  Smith

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Works fine and easy to use but I wish the scent would last longer
customer_reviews.author: smokechecktim

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I was a little disappointed with this I thought that it would help absorb an odor Where my pet and had an accident and she had a bladder infection. It didn't making a difference at all.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee Dawn Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but is does work.
customer_reviews.text: Product is ok. However, if you need to do a small rug? You will use the whole container all at once. Rather expensive or just in shot! No smell but does get rid of pet smell in carpet!
customer_reviews.author: sean

customer_reviews.title: This is the one for pet owners!
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with how well this carpet powder absorbs odors from pets. We have three dogs and two cats and I love that the product has hardly any scent and works so well.
customer_reviews.author: CBW

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for homes with fur babies
customer_reviews.text: Great fresh scent. Perfect for a home with fur babies. No overpowering perfume. Used weekly to keep house fresh.
customer_reviews.author: mouse470

customer_reviews.title: Fresh smell
customer_reviews.text: It was difficult to get the powder to stay on my dog.
customer_reviews.author: Super Shopper

customer_reviews.title: WORKS GREAT!!
customer_reviews.text: My son had a funky "boy" smell in his room I couldn't get rid of no matter how many times I cleaned his carpets or sprinkled scented carpet fresheners on it. This stuff took care of the smell almost immediately and still gone. THANK YOU
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Mayer

customer_reviews.title: It's an okay product. Smell doesn't last really. ...
customer_reviews.text: It's an okay product. Smell doesn't last really. Not worth the price. The cheap powders at the store leave more of a scent than this does.
customer_reviews.author: Dzelili

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is the real deal. Love the smell and it does last.
customer_reviews.author: Mo Elkholi

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is AMAZING! It doesn't have the strong odor of the ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is AMAZING! It doesn't have the strong odor of the competitors but it's just enough to eliminate any pet odor. A little expensive and I wish they made a bigger size but it's worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Has no smell
customer_reviews.text: I read about this like it was gonna freshen my carpet, but it did nothing no smell very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Randy David Kitler

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Used 5 containers in a living room& dining room of a rental property that had a pet smell. Fairly useless.
customer_reviews.author: bdalder

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: Not as expected. There is no freshness in the carpet..
customer_reviews.author: SARV

customer_reviews.title: Didn't do anything
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money! Disappointed and did absolutely nothing for freshening carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Cam32

customer_reviews.title: Used this twice and its pretty good. Not sure if its outstanding but its ...
customer_reviews.text: Used this twice and its pretty good. Not sure if its outstanding but its very mild and does seem to help with the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Basically baking soda with some essential oils. Didn't work at all.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy B

customer_reviews.title: Needs to be bigger
customer_reviews.text: Like the smell works great but wish it was bigger. Gone in a few days with puppy accidents.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Grech

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works good, but works just as good as a much cheaper brand.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Scent
customer_reviews.text: For those with perfume allergies, the scent is strong. Floral scent hits you hard right away.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Boo Hoo!
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected. It doesn’t suck up the urine.
customer_reviews.author: Relaxed poise

customer_reviews.title: Good scent
customer_reviews.text: I like the product, it is a pretty small bottle though
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Armbrust

customer_reviews.title: Smells bad!
customer_reviews.text: This smells bad, like a bad perfume and not citrus.
customer_reviews.author: Michele K.

customer_reviews.title: Dog use
customer_reviews.text: I have to use it pretty often for the dogs room, but the directions say to. It works pretty well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing, love that it is natural
customer_reviews.text: I use it every single time I vacuum my carpets. Will be buying in bulk/multiple bottles the next time around.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great cheaper product with nice smell.
customer_reviews.text: Gave this 5 stars because there was nothing wrong and it smelled nice. I needed it to freshen up my carpeted areas - they were starting to get a little icky with dog smell (plus he pooped twice on the carpet due to separation anxiety). I thought the scent was quite strong at first but it went away very quickly in my opinion. Worked great for what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Used an entire bottle on a 9x6 ft jute rug ...
customer_reviews.text: Used an entire bottle on a 9x6 ft jute rug and I didn't really even notice a difference. The actual powder was more strong smelling than I expected, but my rug still stinks.
customer_reviews.author: L. Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Super strong scent
customer_reviews.text: Wow--super strong scent. It's not an unpleasant smell exactly, but it certainly fills the air and would be aggravating to people sensitive to strong smells. (It did eventually go away a while after vacuuming it up.)
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

product_meta.title: PL360 Odor Neutralizing Carpet Powder, 16oz
product_meta.description: Size:1 packPL360 Odor Neutralizing Carpet Powder works to eliminate even the strongest pet odors from your home. Because no matter how much we love our pets, we don’t love what they do to our carpets by trekking, rolling, and even sleeping. A great daily cleaner is just what you need. PL360 Odor Neutralizing Carpet Powder is easy to use and works without the use of ammonia, bleach, phosphates, phthalates or sulfates. Baking soda with powerful absorbents and neutralizers eliminate stains and odors at the root. ‘Cuz Pet Love means never having to say, “Stay off the carpet!”. Made in the USA.
feature_bullets: Contains 1 - 16 Ounce container. Packaging may vary.
Made with a mineral-derived absorbent and corn starch to completely absorb liquid and odors.
Made without ammonia, chlorine bleach, phosphates, phthalates, sulfates, dyes.
Great to use on carpets, rugs and upholstery, leaves behind a long-lasting fresh citrus scent
Helps prevent pets from re-soiling the same area. Made in the USA. Never tested on animals
Works great on: carpet and fabric, especially problem spots
